Title: Political Power
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Hilary Florido, Katie Mitroff, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Kat Morris (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story)
Actors: Zach Callison, Estelle, Michaela Dietz, Deedee Magno
Plot: When Pearl accidentally causes a blackout, Steven helps Mayor Dewey keep the morale of Beach City's residents high.
